strapiPost.title: More Festive
strapiPost.content:
We hope youâ€™re ready for artisan crafts and cheeses, because the annual Holiday Markets on the Historic Downtown Square are about to begin! 

  • Shopping: The Fayetteville Farmers Market is transforming yet again into a square full of unique, handcrafted items alongside seasonal baked goods, fruits, vegetables and more! Expect live music and food trucks at the Markets too, which will be on Saturdays Nov. 20, Dec. 4,11, and 18. 
  • Pick-up: The Farmers Market will continue online through the winter. If you place an order between Sundays at 6p and Wednesdays at 6a, you can pick it up at the Fayetteville Public Library on Thursdays. 

Click HERE for more information.
